HOUSE.opening: O.M.G you should totally check out the
HOUSE.ending: it's sooooooooo much fun in there!
it's such a good place to be!

COMMENT.mean: I tried, but Brian made me physically sick...urgh.
Dave is into stuff i'm find disturbing. But i gave it a go anyway!
COMMENT.nice: Me and Dave are into the same things. But he likes to remain in control.

COMMENT.mean: I've not had Dennis yet. Don't want to either. Don't like vain guys.
I'm not that into girls...Diana is a girl, isn't she?
COMMENT.nice: Diana knows what a girl likes!

COMMENT.mean: Geoff kept the outfit on. I think he's ashamed about what's underneath. So he should be.
COMMENT.nice: I had a very entertained night with Geoff...Yes, I said night!

COMMENT.mean: Adam definitely needs make up for other shortcommings, if you know what I mean?
COMMENT.nice: Adam is soooooooo sweet! He bought me chocolates and flowers aferwards.

COMMENT.mean: Urgh, Jessica is such a slut. I don't why what anyone sees in her.

COMMENT.nice: Katie is soooooooo smooth. She's like all buttery.

COMMENT.mean: Kerry just needs to get over herself, seriously.
COMMENT.nice: Kerry is such a good friend. Well, maybe she's more than just a friend...

COMMENT.mean: Adam is sooooooooo selfish. All he thought about was himself.
COMMENT.nice: Adam...he's such a surprise. Who knew!

COMMENT.mean: Pat started turning me away from his clinic. He referred me somewhere else. Inexcusable.
COMMENT.nice: Pat helps me out the morning after. He's sooooooooo considerate.

COMMENT.mean: I think Rich is gay. Nothing wrong with that But he's mean to me.
COMMENT.nice: Rich and I are going to get married. I soooooooooo want his babies!

COMMENT.mean: Scooter doesn't know what he's doing. He's really inexperienced, and I can tell!
COMMENT.nice: Scooter knows how to rev up my engine!
Shmebulock plays hard to get. I like a challenge...

COMMENT.mean: Susan almost killed me! Who does that to a girl!
COMMENT.nice: Susan's pie tastes nice. Just like a real pie...hmmmm

COMMENT.mean: Tifa is a right bitch, I hate her!!!!!
COMMENT.nice: Tifa is my BFF. She's with me whatever get up to.

COMMENT.mean: Tom thinks he's all that. Well, he's not. Not even close.
COMMENT.nice: Tom knows how to treat a lady.

RANDOM.comment: I brighten up every ones day. I'm justt a great big ball of sunshine!
There's some nasty rumours going round about me. They're not true at all, i'll have you know!
I'm planning my wedding day already! I can't wait...what do you mean 'I need a bloke first'???
